name: A Reconnaissance of Envi 5
description:
Story:

The signal from a space station called "ENVI 5" has gone missing and a hacker named Adrian was tasked to connect to it and remotely find out what happened.

The station seems to be completely deserted.


Basic Controls:
  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump ( hold to jump higher )
  • M - Map
  • P - Pause Menu
Soundtrack:

Feel free to use the soundtrack in your own games or youtube videos. You can find it in the downloads.

Notes: known issues:
  • Playing the web version can lead to audio glitching or audio delay.
  • Playing the web version will make the mouse cursor disappear when not moving for a while
  • The wall crawling enemies can get stuck in the ground. I have tried to fix this but it still happens sometimes.

If there is interest for a guide or a dev playthrough, just let me know in the comments and I will do it.
